Posts.Content: Oct 11, 2010 07:23AM - edited Aug 20, 2013 11:55AM by janettacarol Hi everyone. I just had my surgery on Tuesday 10/5. Everything went as expected until I spiked a fever (which prolonged my hospital stay). My prayers are with all of you. the surgery has left me feeling weak and extremely sore and two drains. The cami the hospital provided is a wonderful relief from the bandages and tape (I can actually breath again). Now I am playing the waiting game for the pathology report and this makes me very nervous.  I just wanted to wish all well and my prayers go to all.
Posts.Title: October 2010 Mastectomy cc4npg cc4npg
